1.text: Pair work Would you like to have your own talk-show? Then select a topic and write 5 questions you would ask your guest. Practise them with your partner. You can choose a topic from the list below.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Pair <break time='200ms'/> work <break time='200ms'/> Would <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> like <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> have <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> own <break time='200ms'/> talk-show? <break time='200ms'/> Then <break time='200ms'/> select <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> topic <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> write <break time='200ms'/> 5 <break time='200ms'/> questions <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> would <break time='200ms'/> ask <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> guest. <break time='200ms'/> Practise <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> with <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> partner. <break time='200ms'/> You <break time='200ms'/> can <break time='200ms'/> choose <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> topic <break time='200ms'/> from <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> list <break time='200ms'/> below. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: Topics: school, hobby, pet, favourite sportsman/sportswoman, favourite story book/cartoon etc.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Topics: <break time='200ms'/> school, <break time='200ms'/> hobby, <break time='200ms'/> pet, <break time='200ms'/> favourite <break time='200ms'/> sportsman/sportswoman, <break time='200ms'/> favourite <break time='200ms'/> story <break time='200ms'/> book/cartoon <break time='200ms'/> etc. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: Read these descriptions and write a paragraph about your favourite sportsman/sportswoman or book.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read <break time='200ms'/> these <break time='200ms'/> descriptions <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> write <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> paragraph <break time='200ms'/> about <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> favourite <break time='200ms'/> sportsman/sportswoman <break time='200ms'/> or <break time='200ms'/> book. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>My <break time='200ms'/> Favourite <break time='200ms'/> Book <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.text: My favourite story book is "Madol Doowa". It is a novel written by the famous writer Martin Wickramasinghe. It is an adventure story. The main characters in the story are two boys named Upali and Jinapala. Upali is the leader of the boy gang. They do a lot of mischievous things and often get into trouble. But later Upali becomes a kind, hardworking young man who helps people. It is an enjoyable story about children like us. I like it very much.
